title: The Riddle of the Gods
description: The war for Deius begins, but first, the battle for Sirin must be fought. In this third and action-packed installment of Shiva XIV, Ayn yearns for freedom while Srah and Axis find their true home. All the while, Yol Notama brings The Tah to the edge of madness! Fates will be decided and old Gods will awaken as the most ancient of riddles is finally answered.
author: Lyra Shanti
